info.title: Neblio REST API Suite
info.description: APIs for Interacting with NTP1 Tokens & The Neblio Blockchain

get.summary: Returns the tokenId representing a token
get.description: Translates a token symbol to a tokenId if a token exists with that symbol on the network

200.description: Object containing the token symbol and ID, if token symbol does not exist on network, empty object is returned.

post.summary: Broadcasts a signed raw transaction to the network
post.description: Broadcasts a signed raw transaction to the network. If successful returns the txid of the broadcast trasnaction.

200.description: An object containing the TXID if the broadcast was successful

get.description: Returns both NEBL and NTP1 token UTXOs held at the given address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Neblio Address to get information on.

200.description: An object with an array of UTXOs for this address

get.description: Returns detailed information regarding an NTP1 transaction.

parameters.name: txid
parameters.description: Neblio txid to get information on.

200.description: An object represending this transaction

get.description: Returns the metadata associated with a token.

parameters.name: verbosity
parameters.description: 0 (Default) is fastest, 1 contains token stats, 2 contains token holding addresses

200.description: An object containing the metadata of a token

get.description: Returns the metadata associated with a token for that specific utxo instead of the issuance transaction.

parameters.name: utxo
parameters.description: Specific UTXO to request metadata for

parameters.name: verbosity
parameters.description: 0 (Default) is fastest, 1 contains token stats, 2 contains token holding addresses

200.description: An object containing the metadata of a token for a UTXO

get.description: Returns the the the addresses holding a token and how many tokens are held

200.description: An object containing all of the addresses holding a token

post.summary: Builds a transaction that issues a new NTP1 Token
post.description: Builds an unsigned raw transaction that issues a new NTP1 token on the Neblio blockchain.

200.description: An object representing the token created

post.summary: Builds a transaction that sends an NTP1 Token
post.description: Builds an unsigned raw transaction that sends an NTP1 token on the Neblio blockchain.

200.description: An object representing the tx to send the token

post.summary: Builds a transaction that burns an NTP1 Token
post.description: Builds an unsigned raw transaction that burns an NTP1 token on the Neblio blockchain.

200.description: An object representing the tx to burn the token

post.summary: Broadcasts a signed raw transaction to the network (not NTP1 specific)
post.description: Broadcasts a signed raw transaction to the network. If successful returns the txid of the broadcast trasnaction.

200.description: An object containing the TXID if the broadcast was successful

get.summary: Returns information regarding a Neblio block
get.description: Returns blockchain data for a given block based upon the block hash

200.description: Object containing all information on a blockchain block

get.description: Returns the block hash of a block at a given block index

200.description: Object containing block hash

get.description: Returns NEBL transaction object representing a NEBL transaction

200.description: Object containing transaction info

get.description: Returns raw transaction hex representing a NEBL transaction

200.description: Object containing raw hex of transaction

get.description: Returns NEBL address object containing information on a specific address

200.description: Object containing address info

get.description: Returns NEBL address balance in satoshis

200.description: Address balance

get.summary: Returns address unconfirmed balance in sats
get.description: Returns NEBL address unconfirmed balance in satoshis

200.description: Address unconfirmed balance

get.summary: Returns total received by address in sats
get.description: Returns total NEBL received by address in satoshis

200.description: Total received by address

get.summary: Returns all UTXOs at a given address
get.description: Returns information on each Unspent Transaction Output contained at an address

200.description: UTXOs at an address

get.summary: Returns total sent by address in sats
get.description: Returns total NEBL sent by address in satoshis

200.description: Total sent by address

get.summary: Get transactions by block or address
get.description: Returns all transactions by block or address

200.description: List of transactions

get.description: Returns information on the node's sync progress

200.description: Sync Info

get.summary: Utility API for calling several blockchain node functions
get.description: Utility API for calling several blockchain node functions - getInfo, getDifficulty, getBestBlockHash, getLastBlockHash

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Function to call, getInfo, getDifficulty, getBestBlockHash, or getLastBlockHash

200.description: Function Response

post.description: Broadcasts a signed raw transaction to the network. If successful returns the txid of the broadcast trasnaction.

200.description: An object containing the TXID if the broadcast was successful

get.description: Returns total NEBL received by address in satoshis

200.description: Total received by address

get.description: Returns information on each Unspent Transaction Output contained at an address

200.description: UTXOs at an address

200.description: List of transactions

200.description: Sync Info

get.summary: Utility API for calling several blockchain node functions
get.description: Utility API for calling several blockchain node functions - getInfo, getDifficulty, getBestBlockHash, getLastBlockHash

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Function to call, getInfo, getDifficulty, getBestBlockHash, or getLastBlockHash

200.description: Function Response

get.summary: Withdraws testnet NEBL to the specified address
get.description: Withdraw testnet NEBL to your Neblio Testnet address. By default amount is 1500000000 or 15 NEBL and has a max of 50 NEBL. Only 2 withdrawals allowed per 24 hour period.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amount of NEBL to withdrawal in satoshis

200.description: Object containing the transaction ID of the withdrawal.

post.summary: Send a JSON-RPC call to a localhost neblio-Qt or nebliod node
post.description: Call any Neblio RPC command from the Neblio API libraries. Useful for signing transactions with a local node and other functions. Will not work from a browser due to CORS restrictions. Requires a node to be running locally at 127.0.0.1

servers.description: Communicate with locally running Neblio node on Mainnet
Communicate with locally running Neblio node on Testnet

200.description: Object containing the JSON response from the Neblio node.

401.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid

sendTokenRequest.description: Object representing the token to be sent

broadcastTxRequest.description: Object representing a transaction to broadcast

issueTokenRequest.description: Object representing the token to be created

burnTokenRequest.description: Object representing the token to be burned

sendTxRequest.description: Object representing a transaction to broadcast

txHex.description: Signed raw tx hex to broadcast

utxos.description: Array of UTXOs held at this address.

index.description: Index of the UTXO at this address

scriptPubKey.description: Object representing the scruptPubKey of the UTXO

used.description: Whether the UTXO has been used

value.description: Value of the UTXO in NEBL satoshi

tokens.description: Array of NTP1 tokens in this UTXO.

tokenId.description: Unique NTP1 identifier for this token

issueTxid.description: TXID the token originally was issued in

divisibility.description: Decimal places the token is divisible to

lockStatus.description: Whether the token is locked, preventing more from being issued

aggregationPolicy.description: Whether the tokens can be aggregated together

issueTxid.description: TXID the token was issued in

divisibility.description: Decimal places the token is divisible to

lockStatus.description: Whether issuance of more tokens is locked

value.description: Value of input in NEBL satoshi
Value of the output in NEBL satoshi

issueTxid.description: TXID the token was issued in

divisibility.description: Decimal places the token is divisible to

lockStatus.description: Whether issuance of more tokens is locked

used.description: Whether this output has now been used

usedBlockheight.description: Blockheight this output was used in

usedTxid.description: TXID this output was used in

totalsent.description: Total NEBL sent in this transaction in satoshis

fee.description: Total NEBL used as fee for this transcation in satoshis

blockhash.description: Hash of the block this transaction is in

divisibility.description: Decimal places the token is divisible to

lockStatus.description: Whether issuance of more tokens is locked

initialIssuanceAmount.description: Total tokens issued in initial issuance

totalSupply.description: Total number of tokens in supply

numOfHolders.description: Total number of addresses this token is held at

numOfTransfers.description: Total number of transactions of this token

numOfIssuance.description: Total number of times this token has been issued

numOfBurns.description: Number of times tokens have been burned

firstBlock.description: Block number token was issued in

issuanceTxid.description: TXID the token was issued with

userData.description: Metadata set by user on token
Metadata set by user on token for UTXO

divibility.description: How many decimal points the token is divisble to

lockStatus.description: Whether new issuances of this token are locked

divisibility.description: Number of decimal places the token should be divisble by (0-7)

fee.description: Fee in satoshi to include in the issuance transaction min 1000000000 (10 NEBL)

reissuable.description: whether the token should be reissuable

flags.description: Object representing flags that potentialy modify this transaction

splitChange.description: If true change will be split into 2 outputs, one for NEBL change and one for NTP1 change (recommended)

address.description: Address to send the amount of issued tokens to

metadata.description: Object representing all metadata at token issuance

tokenName.description: Token Symbol it will be identified by (ex. NIBBL)

description.description: Long name or description of token (ex. Nibble)

dataHash.description: Hash of data at the URL, used for verification

userData.description: Metadata set by user on token

encryptions.description: Array of encryption instruction objects for encrypting userData

pubkey.description: RSA public key used for encryption

items.description: Array of objects describing fee rules

address.description: Address fee is auto sent to

tokenId.description: How fee should be paid, either with a tokenId, or with NEBL if null

value.description: Amount of NTP1 token, or NEBL (in satoshi) to pay as fee

locked.description: Whether this rule can be modified in future transactions

holders.description: Array of objects describing what addresses can hold the token

address.description: Address that can hold the token

locked.description: Whether this rule can be modified in future transactions

expiration.description: Object describing expiration rules of the token

locked.description: Whether this rule can be modified in future transactions

tokenId.description: TokenId of the to be issued token

txHex.description: Unsigned, raw transaction hex of the transaction to issue the token

fee.description: Fee in satoshi to include in the issuance transaction min 10000 (0.0001 NEBL)

from.description: Array of addresses to send the token from

sendutxo.description: Array of UTXOs to send the token from

tokenId.description: ID of token we are sending

flags.description: Object representing flags that potentialy modify this transaction

splitChange.description: If true change will be split into 2 outputs, one for NEBL change and one for NTP1 change (recommended)

metadata.description: Object representing all metadata at token issuance

tokenName.description: Token Symbol it will be identified by (ex. NIBBL)

description.description: Long name or description of token (ex. Nibble)

encryptions.description: Array of encryption instruction objects for encrypting userData

pubkey.description: RSA public key used for encryption

items.description: Array of objects describing fee rules

address.description: Address fee is auto sent to

tokenId.description: How fee should be paid, either with a tokenId, or with NEBL if null

value.description: Amount of NTP1 token, or NEBL (in satoshi) to pay as fee

locked.description: Whether this rule can be modified in future transactions

holders.description: Array of objects describing what addresses can hold the token

address.description: Address that can hold the token

locked.description: Whether this rule can be modified in future transactions

expiration.description: Object describing expiration rules of the token

locked.description: Whether this rule can be modified in future transactions

txHex.description: Unsigned, raw transaction hex of the transaction to send the token

ntp1OutputIndexes.description: Array of indexes transfering NTP1 tokens

multisigOutputs.description: Array of indexes of multisig outputs

fee.description: Fee in satoshi to include in the issuance transaction min 10000 (0.0001 NEBL)

from.description: Array of addresses to send the token from

tokenId.description: ID of token we are sending

burn.description: Array of objects representing tokens to be burned

tokenId.description: Unique token id we are burning

txHex.description: Unsigned, raw transaction hex of the transaction to burn the token

ntp1OutputIndexes.description: Array of indexes transfering NTP1 tokens

multisigOutputs.description: Array of indexes of multisig outputs

txHex.description: Signed raw tx hex to broadcast

tx.description: Array of tx ids in the block

previousblockhash.description: Hash of the previous block on the chain

nextblockhash.description: Hash of the next block on the chain

reward.description: Number of NEBL awarded in this block

valueSat.description: Value of input in NEBL satoshi

value.description: Value of the output in NEBL

used.description: Whether this output has now been used

usedBlockheight.description: Blockheight this output was used in

usedTxid.description: TXID this output was used in

totalsent.description: Total NEBL sent in this transaction in satoshis

fee.description: Total NEBL used as fee for this transcation in satoshis

blockhash.description: Hash of the block this transaction is in

valueOut.description: Total NEBL output in this transaction

valueIn.description: Total NEBL input in this transaction

fees.description: Total NEBL used in fees for this transaction

unconfirmedTxAppearances.description: Number of unconfirmed transactions for this address

txAppearances.description: Number of transactions for this address

transactions.description: Array of transaction ids for this address

getAddressUtxosResponse.description: Array of objects representing this address' UTXOs

getTxsResponse.description: Object containing an array of transaction objects

getStatusResponse.description: Depending on the function called, the structure and information contained in this object will vary

method.description: Name of the Neblio RPC method to call

params.description: Array of string params that should be passed to the RPC method.

rpcResponse.description: Object containing the JSON response from the Neblio node.
